name: AdServe
tag_list: display-advertising, advertising, online-advertising, online-marketing, make-money-online, advertising-network, internet-advertising, cpm, media-buying, ad-platform
overview:
AdServe -Premier global media buying solution

AdServe serves up to 15 billion ad impressions per month, 6 million daily unique visitors and reaches over 226 countries worldwide. AdServe connects advertisers, marketers and agencies to our exclusive properties.

AdServe’s core value is ‘Innovation’, and has uniquely position the company as a high performance and technologically advance content provider in today’s online world. The ad serving platform, known as AdPlate - allows our advertisers to reach a distinct set of users. Advertisers have a large selection of ad formats to choose from whether it is In-Stream (VAST & VPAID Compliant), Banners, AdBox and Pop Under.

offices.address1: Unit 301, 3/F, Hung To Centre, 94-96 How Ming Street, Kwun Tong, Hong Kong
